subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: As Major League Soccer expands to 15 teams next year, then to 16 teams in 2010, and with more expansion expected, the league plans to search for more foreign players to fill out its rosters.
snippet: As Major League Soccer expands to 15 teams next year, then to 16 teams in 2010, and with more expansion expected, the league plans to search for more foreign players to fill out its rosters.
